website_summaries.verdict: A toddler product ATV without a motor that looks just like mom or dads, and that talks and lights up.
pros: Push bar on back makes this great for kids just learning to walk
Doubles as a walker for toddler
Can be used outside or inside
cons: This is not powered by a battery
It is a self-powered product that is just for play

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: False advertising... the ATV is not automatic it’s a push. The battery operation is from sounds only
customer_reviews.author: David Crislip

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a ride on toy for our 9 month old. Also wanted some thing here could use as a walker. This works well for both and looks so much better! Not cartoony or overly boyish or girly. Perfect for 1-2 year olds. One of my sons top favorite toys!! Still a year and a half later. Light weight, easily glides over hard floors and carpet. The sounds are kind of loud. I can see him and future siblings using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: samanthaxrandom

customer_reviews.title: Issues with design; Ships fine; kid feels macho
customer_reviews.text: Pros: shipped in one piece; item as described (although i wouldn't say "rugged"), can be used on various surfaces, sounds are neat. Cons: very lightweight almost flimsy, no way would i let my kiddo use this to push-to-walk as it slips all over. No traction at all.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: my son loves this thing. I could do with ...
customer_reviews.text: my son loves this thing. I could do with out the pre-recorded, button activated voice overs, but he digs it, so I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well made for a starter ride on toy.
customer_reviews.text: This quad is so cool..We purchased 2 for our 1 year old identical twin grandsons. They absolutely love them! They can easily get on and off because it is made very sturdy. Love to press the dash for the different sounds and wiggle to the song when it plays. It has also helped them master walking by using the bar on the back. Very pleased with the Honda ATV and can’t wait to watch them ride them in the great outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Moody

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: 18 month old kid too big, couldn’t push since his feet would hit the wheels. Kinda pointless really. Used for about 20 mins over 4 weeks. Steering was way limited. The buttons and sounds were more entertaining than actually pushing the ATV with his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: ATV is a child toy.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a motorize ATV about the same size as this one in pink color. I thought this was also motorized, but I fail to read it the way to the end. The two were about the same cost. My bad, but this was not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Basil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my 2 year old nephews, and you can't beat the price. I definitely "won" Christmas this past year with their "cars" 😂😂
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: This doesnt come with a foot rest.
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of it feels sturdy however there's no place to put his feet so when he moves with it his feet comes in contact with the wheels which affects the smoothness of how it operates and could be a possible safety hazard. That's my only disappointment with it other than that is a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Lesliano

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & Fun
customer_reviews.text: Everything was packaged as expected. Shipping was on time. I am satisfied with this purchase and would for sure but again if there is ever a need.
customer_reviews.author: teresa fugate

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1 year old grandson. I love that it makes all the noises like a real quad. He likes to stand behind it and push it as much as he likes sitting on it. He just got it and hasn't learned how to make his feet make it go yet without us pushing him. I bought it on sale. I'm not sure I would've paid the original $75 for it no matter how much I like it. That's just robbery.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for 2 years and under.
customer_reviews.text: Not battery powered. It was perfect for my nephew who has just started to walk, he pushes it everywhere. It has fun sounds, and music.
customer_reviews.author: _kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Tried to return
customer_reviews.text: I tried to return this because it was not battery powered and I still have not received the refund. It was completely not worth the price for what it was.
customer_reviews.author: Porkchop

customer_reviews.title: Fit for a 2 year boy
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. But arrived with a defective cracked 🔋 battery. Therefore couldn't be riden with power.
customer_reviews.author: MLYama

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected... looked nice tho
customer_reviews.text: Not a real rider.... I expected the battery operated to ride... battery plays sound. :)
customer_reviews.author: Flooraandfawna

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks
customer_reviews.text: The ad is misleading especially when considering the price point. I bought it for me 3 year old son, it's too small for him, he'll probably get another month out of it and that's it. Had the price been lower, the toy size and lack of battery would have made more sense.
customer_reviews.author: Tara James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Good Value, sturdy, not cheap looking. My one year old grandson loves it. Espically all the songs and noise's it makes. Can not keep him off of it. He is very rough with it and I can see this toy lasting a long while. Best toy purchase I have made for him yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 15 month grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 15 months old and this was perfect for him. He loves to dance to the music and rev the engine lol. The only thing that could be better is more room between tires so they don’t catch his feet when you push him. But sooo cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: j.kirpes

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my 18 month old
customer_reviews.text: my son cruises all day long on this little wheeler! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Zais

customer_reviews.title: Does not have motor . Not worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking it had a motor for that price , I guess because it had Honda written on it that made it worth 75 plus.$ , ? 🤔🥴
customer_reviews.author: clint

customer_reviews.title: False advertisment NOT 6V
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed it should not say 6v at the top if the child has to move it themself
customer_reviews.author: Shelby H.

customer_reviews.title: Not for a 3 years old
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not for a 3 year old my nephew had to crouch his legs when putting it on the leg stand
customer_reviews.author: Neha C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for my little nephew. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Nierengarten

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for him
customer_reviews.text: My one yr old grandson loves it...perfect size for him!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Not battery operate
customer_reviews.text: No worth money it was broke when I received it. Also is not battery operated. Too much money for what it is
customer_reviews.author: Marli Koch

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it.. Fell off a couple times ...
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves it ..Fell off a couple times. Have to remember to get off one leg at a time.
customer_reviews.author: sholita

customer_reviews.title: Honda push toy
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was looking for I think it’s a little expensive for a push toy. But 1 1/2 yr old liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Lizotte

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute for my 1 year old. Its light wish it was a little more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Should be plastic on there, not gift rapper
customer_reviews.text: This is my last shopping from amazon cause no plastic rapping , no catalog , no gift rapping, it’s worse shopping
customer_reviews.author: Sabitri Gharti Magar

customer_reviews.title: Its.coo
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than i thought and not electric maybe i didnt read
customer_reviews.author: Craig L Watch

customer_reviews.title: They love them. The only thing that was weird to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2. a pink and brown one for my grand kids. They love them. The only thing that was weird to me was the brown one is louder them the other. I sell Honda's so I had to have these. Now the whole family drives Honda!
customer_reviews.author: Kristal  Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: 4-wheeler is awesome. Very durable and sturdy. He used as a walker before he could ride it. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Not a 6volt ride on!!
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a 6volt ride on but it isn’t. It only lights up when buttons are pushed. When it came it was broken. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not electric not made well for child to even push
customer_reviews.text: I think this is false advertising!!! This is not electric!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Lockard

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, but over priced for what you get and size.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming

customer_reviews.title: It what I expected
customer_reviews.text: When purchasing this item, I didn’t realize that it didn’t have a motor since it was in the same category as the 12v and 6v ride on toys. I ended up donating it to my kids school and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: amazonmomof3

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my nephews I got it on sale and for the price it was awesome ! They loved it it's a perfect size for a 18-36 months olds Both my nephews are 2 and it was the perfect size for them
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: The package was damaged and so was the product. ...
customer_reviews.text: The package was damaged and so was the product. My son opened it for Christmas day and the back wheel is broken off. So pissed off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not a Power Wheels, it only moves ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a Power Wheels, it only moves under their own power. Does not have a motor in it. RIP OFF!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Risdell

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Horrible advertisement! My son just turned 2 and he is way to big for it. This should only be for kids 1 & under. It’s not automatic at all, and not all of the buttons work.
customer_reviews.author: Keiarey Nathan

product_meta.title: Honda Brown HD Camo Utility ATV, Brown
product_meta.description: The rugged and durable Honda brown HD camo utility ATV is an officially licensed Honda product featuring the uniquely realistic Honda Phantom camo pattern printed all four fenders. Press the 3 Light-Up Dash buttons to hear the original song, talking phrases and fun sounds. Twist the throttle to hear realistic revving sounds. This utility ATV includes both front and rear racks. Super-grip tires provide a stable ride. Parents can select the volume level that's right for their home. Requires 2 AAA batteries included. Seat Height is 8.5 inches. Recommended for ages 1 to 3 years and up to 40 lbs. Watts - 1.5V
feature_bullets: Uniquely realistic Honda Phantom camo printed on all 4 fenders
Original song, talking phrases and fun sounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars141 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
